title: {{ TOOL_NAME }}

section.title: commands
section.line: لتنزيل صفحة الويب وإنشاء خادم flask

section:
<line command=" __attr__:"> <line command=" [green]tag <[red]get[/red] tag ><[red]attr[/red] option /></[red]get[/red]>[/green]">
<line command=" __get__:"> <line command=" [green]tag <[red]get[/red] tag ></[red]get[/red]>[/green]">
<line command=" __if__:"> <line command=" [green]tag <[red]get[/red] tag ><[red]if[/red] option='value' /></[red]get[/red]>[/green]">
<line command=" ___if__:"> <line command=" [green]tag <[red]tag_if[/red] option='value' />[/green]">
<line command=" [green]option[/green]">
